meanings.definition: To cause someone to become bankrupt.
meanings.sent1: By spending all his money on unnecessary things, he is bankrupting himself.
meanings.sent2: The company's poor financial decisions are bankrupting it slowly.
meanings.sent3: His love for luxury items is bankrupting his wallet!
meanings.sent4: The constant overspending is bankrupting his savings like a leaky faucet.
meanings.sent5: Her reckless shopping habits are bankrupting her faster than she realizes.

meanings.definition: The act of making someone bankrupt.
meanings.sent1: The bankrupting of the business was a result of mismanagement.
meanings.sent2: She witnessed the bankrupting of her friend's small shop.
meanings.sent3: The bankrupting of the company led to many job losses.
meanings.sent4: The bankrupting of the family's finances was a wake-up call.
meanings.sent5: The bankrupting of the organization was a cautionary tale for others.
